entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -19.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 11:16 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

Temperature: -19.8°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %

Dewpoint: -23.9°C

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
